data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S8 (SM-G950F), Android Nougat 7.0 and Windows 10 Home 64-bit v1703
data.expected_result: The whole menu should be visible and it should just be updated with the new role
data.short_description: User details are minimized when a user with no roles gets a role
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you have the Manage Roles permission for - Create a new role - Open the user's profile on mobile by press holding on it and then give the user the role on desktop
